verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
The Lord bless you and keep you
The Lord make His face to shine on you,
and be gracious unto you,
The Lord be gracious unto you

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The Lord make His countenance upon you,
and give you peace, and give you peace.
The Lord make His countenance upon you,
and give you peace.
